column1: [{"classname": "meme", "def_wiki": "Any unit of cultural information, such as a practice or idea, that is transmitted verbally or by repeated action from one mind to another in a comparable way to the transmission of genes.", "path_wn": ["meme", "acculturation", "content", "cognition", "psychological_feature", "abstraction", "entity"], "def_wn": "a cultural unit (an idea or value or pattern of behavior) that is passed from one person to another by non-genetic means (as by imitation)"}, {"classname": "hatespeech meme", "def_wiki": "Any unit of cultural information, such as a practice or idea, that is transmitted verbally or by repeated action from one mind to another in a comparable way to the transmission of genes.", "path_wn": "", "def_wn": ""}]
